Class Config.Builder

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.Config.Builder
Enclosing class:
Config
public static class Config.Builder extends Object
A fluent-style builder for Configs.
Author:
Greg Haines
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • withHostAndPort

      public Config.Builder withHostAndPort(String host, int port)
      Configs created by this Builder will connect to the specified hostname and port.

      Clients created from this config will not use sentinels.

      Parameters:
      host - the Redis hostname
      port - the Redis port number
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • withMasterNameAndSentinels

      public Config.Builder withMasterNameAndSentinels(String masterName, Set<redis.clients.jedis.HostAndPort> sentinels)
      Configs created by this Builder will connect to the specified master name and sentinels.

      Clients created from this config will not use hostname and port.

      Parameters:
      masterName - the Redis master name
      sentinels - the set of Redis sentinel hostnames and ports
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • withNamespace

      public Config.Builder withNamespace(String namespace)
      Configs created by this Builder will have the given Redis namespace to prefix keys with.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the Redis namespace to prefix keys with
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • withTimeout

      public Config.Builder withTimeout(int timeout)
      Configs created by this Builder will have the given Redis connection timeout.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the Redis connection timeout
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • withUser

      public Config.Builder withUser(String user)
      Configs created by this Builder will authenticate with the given Redis user.
      Parameters:
      user - the Redis user
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • withPassword

      public Config.Builder withPassword(String password)
      Configs created by this Builder will authenticate with the given Redis password.
      Parameters:
      password - the Redis password
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • withDatabase

      public Config.Builder withDatabase(int database)
      Configs created by this Builder will use the given Redis database.
      Parameters:
      database - the Redis database to use
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • withJedisClientConfig

      public Config.Builder withJedisClientConfig(redis.clients.jedis.JedisClientConfig clientConfig)
      Configs created by this Builder will use the JedisClientConfig.
      Parameters:
      clientConfig - the JedisClientConfig to use
      Returns:
      this Builder

    • build

      public Config build()
      Returns:
      a new Config initialized with the current values
